column1: michelina conte| wife of the late nicola conte. mother of freddie conte
column2: peter conte and nick conte. mother-in-law of donna and annette. grandmother of peter michael conte
column4: daniel conte and andrew conte. sister of frank pizza and louisa rozza. survived by her nieces
column5: nephews and their extended families. reposing at d'arienzo funeral home
column6: inc. 104 skillman avenue brooklyn monday june 15th and tuesday june 16th 2-5 & 7-9pm. mass of christian burial divine mercy parish @ saint francis r. c. church 219 conselyea street brooklyn wednesday june 17th 10:00am. entombment saint john's cemetery 80-01 metropolitan avenue middle village
